title: S13 Ep59: ENCOUNTERS with the Paranormal
itunes:title: ENCOUNTERS with the Paranormal
description:
Today on BEYOND the DARKNESS, Dave & Tim have ENCOUNTERS with the Paranormal with guest Jason Higgs.

Jason has been interested in the paranormal since being a young lad. When he was just 9 years old he had his first spooky encounter and has been searching for a reason for that experience ever since.

'Encounters' is a brand new Paranormal Show which uses the latest cutting edge technology in the paranormal field and sees Seasoned Investigator and Haunted Plymouth team member, Jason Higgs experience alleged Haunted Locations around the Country ... Alone.

Watch the show now here: https://www.footprint.tv/tvshow/206040

Get his books here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio

Listen to more New England Legends here:
http://ournewenglandlegends.com/

For an excellent Psychic Reading, check out PsychicSource.com or call 855-453-2000 use promo code DARKNESS for special introductory rates. You must be at least 18 and have a valid credit card in your name.
